name: JamIt
description:
JamIt a strategy game that will love by any age group.

Get in your desk to accumulate work time and avoid to get distracted by the junior developers! You can use the following help to get them distracted: Click at the tools button to activate Watson, while active you can make contact with it to increase your health.

-You can as well turn on the shoot the screens with your laser, wait until they're close to the screen to be attracted to it!

-Pickup the battery to reload your laser -Don't shoot at the junior developers, that makes them faster
